title: Low Priority Queue timer reset?
body:
A month ago I received a low priority queue due to constant dodging to join games with friends. I dealt with it and went without dodging for an entire month. 

Today I had a bit of an emergency and had to leave a game for 5 minutes. As soon as i came back I reconnected and my team won the game. Immediately after I got punished with a low priority queue lasting for 10 whole minutes. Does this timer ever reset?

replies.body: It isn't based on time since last dodge, it is based on games played. It does go down if you consistantly go without leaving for a while though.
